summary: A command‑line utility that prepares evaluation data, builds prompts, calls the Mixtral‑8x7B model via the NGC API, parses the returned judgments, and aggregates scores to evaluate multimodal language model outputs.
business_intent: Automate and scale the benchmarking of multimodal LLM performance by using Mixtral as an external judge, providing quantitative assessment for model comparison and quality monitoring.
